body:
### Problem

           PID: 1539133 (nvim)
           UID: 1000 (*)
           GID: 1000 (*)
        Signal: 11 (SEGV)
     Timestamp: Mon 2024-04-22 09:13:08 CST (2s ago)
  Command Line: nvim --embed init.lua
    Executable: /usr/bin/nvim

      Hostname: archlinux
       Storage: /var/lib/systemd/coredump/core.nvim.1000.c9e76f59bef1477eb2954aba1a3233ca.1539133.1713748388000000.zst (present)
  Size on Disk: 7.3M
       Message: Process 1539133 (nvim) of user 1000 dumped core.

                #0  0x0000000000000000 n/a (n/a + 0x0)
                ELF object binary architecture: AMD x86-64

### Steps to reproduce

nvim init.lua
wait 3 seconds
nvim crashed


### Expected behavior

keep running 

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.10.0-dev-2968+g344906a08f Build type: RelWithDebInfo LuaJIT 2.1.1702233742

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

Arch Linux x86_64  6.8.1-arch1-1 

### Terminal name/version

kitty 0.33.0

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-256color

### Installation

6.8.1-arch1-1

labels.description: issues that are closed as duplicates of other issues
labels.name: closed:duplicate

title: nightly version crash after opened a file
